moves.name: Smog
moves.effect: Has a moderately good chance of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Move Gauge Boost
moves.effect: Increases the user’s move gauge by three.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Outta My Way!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Sp. Atk and Speed by up to three stat ranks based on the amount remaining in the user’s move gauge.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 2
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Flameproof
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting burned.
